title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 223.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 223.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all petroleum refineries, except
for sections 223.7 and
223.10
which apply only to those
petroleum refineries located in a nonattainment area for
ozone. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
223.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
